altTitles.ja: アンデッドアンラック
アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.ru:
«Пока я лежал на кровати посреди ночи в полном одиночестве, твой голос был моим единственным утешением. Я хочу поговорить с тобой ещё раз. И должен кое-что тебе сказать».

Ямабуки Арису, ученик второго класса старшей школы, ищет бывшую ведущую радио-стримов «Аполло», не зная ни её лица, ни имени. Однако, однажды он понимает, что Аполло скрывается среди участниц клуба радиовещания в его школе. Четыре красавицы оттуда мечтают получить работу, связанную с голосом. Но которая из них — Аполло? И что станет с их мечтами? Милый ромком о тяжёлом труде и успехе начинается!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.zh: 我的食物看起来很可爱

altTitles.en: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shíwù kàn qǐlái hěn kě'ài

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的食物看起來很可愛

description.en: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
description.es-la: Maria, una vampiro que había estado durmiendo por casi doscientos años, es despertada por Xing Lan, una chica lobo que pasaba por ahí. Cuando el ataúd se abre, una maldición cae sobre Xing Lan. Sin embargo, en lugar de asustarse, la inocente Xing Lan cree haber encontrado una excelente compañera, y ambas embarcan juntas un viaje a la ciudad. Así comienza su historia.

description.en: “R“ or rather Room 402 is the room where our illustrious female main character lives. One day which seems to be by mere coincidence her fate intertwines with that of Sasamoto, a savvy man who seems to be down in the dumps. That is until he picks up a trinket which fell from her nether regions. Prepare yourself for a story of sexual psychological horror as Sasamoto enters into a brave new world.

altTitles.ja: 帝乃三姉妹は案外、チョロい。

altTitles.zh-hk: 帝乃三姊妹意外的好對付。

altTitles.en: The Mikadono Sisters Are Surprisingly Easy to Deal With.

altTitles.zh: 帝乃三姐妹原来很好搞定

altTitles.id: Kakak beradik Mikadono ternyata sangat mudah ditangani.

description.en: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
description.id: Meskipun Ayase Yuu adalah putra seorang aktris terkenal dan berbakat, dia berada di bawah rata-rata dalam segala hal yang dia lakukan. Dia dipercaya untuk hidup di bawah asuhan teman ibunya, dan kemudian mengetahui bahwa dia juga akan sekamar dengan tiga saudara perempuan dari sekolahnya yang memiliki kecantikan dan bakat. Meskipun Yuu berpikir bahwa pemahaman tidak mungkin dicapai antara orang biasa dan mereka yang diberkati dengan bakat, ketiga saudara perempuan itu secara mengejutkan...?!
description.ja:
孤高の天才三姉妹と同居することになったちょっとポンコツめな高校生・優。平凡以下な彼が三姉妹に振り回されると思いきや…この三姉妹、案外、チョロい――？

優との生活で変わっていく三姉妹の心模様。才色兼備の三姉妹が動揺、狼狽、そしてときめく…
description.pt-br: Embora Ayase Yuu seja filho de uma atriz renomada e talentosa, ele está abaixo da média em tudo o que faz. Ele é encarregado de viver sob os cuidados de um amigo de sua mãe, e mais tarde descobre que também vai morar com as três irmãs de sua escola que possuem beleza e talento. Embora Yuu pensasse que um entendimento seria impossível de alcançar entre uma pessoa comum e aqueles abençoados com talento, as três irmãs são surpreendentemente...?!

altTitles.zh-ro: Si Ling Fashi! Wo Ji Shi Tianzai
Sǐ Líng Fǎshī! Wǒ Jí Shì Tiānzāi

description.en:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?
description.zh: 游戏降临现实，世界规则颠覆，人类进入全民转职时代。 唯有成为转职者！升级变强！方能站上世界之巅！ 转职当天，林默语成为唯一性隐藏职业，死灵法师。 从此召唤物不死绝，林默语便不会死。 “我高坐骸骨神座，行走生死之间。” “我即是天灾！”

title.en: NEET dakedo Hello Work ni Ittara Isekai ni Tsuretekareta

altTitles.en: I'm a NEET but when I went to Hello Work I got taken to another world

altTitles.ru: Я NEET, но когда пошёл устраиваться на работу, попал в иной мир

altTitles.ja: ニートだけどハロワにいったら異世界につれてかれた

altTitles.zh: 尼特族的异世界就职记

description.en:
The 23-year-old NEET Masaru Yamano went to Hello Work and found an interesting job offer. 
 
_"A sword and sorcery fantasy, playtest for Miniature Garden of Razgrad World. Extended period of time, preferred to be able to live on-site. Monthly salary of 250,000+ yen."_ 
 
He immediately goes to the interview and signs a contract. However, the place of employment is another world. Because of the contract, he’s taken there. To survive, Masaru receives a cheat, but he is told the shocking truth: the world will be destroyed in 20 years! Can a simple NEET prevent the destruction of the world?!
description.ru:
23-летний безработный Ямано Масару отправился в Hello Work и нашёл интересное предложение работы.  
«Тестовая игра в маленьком саду «Мир Разград». Срок работы длительный, с проживанием на рабочем месте. Оплата: 250 000 иен + комиссия.»  
Пройдя собеседование и подписав договор, Масару попадает на место своей новой работы — другой мир! Согласно договору, Масару получил особую способность, а вскоре узнал шокирующую правду: «этот мир будет уничтожен через 20 лет». Сможет ли простой безработный предотвратить разрушение мира?!

altTitles.ja: 天に逆らう邪神の帰還

description.en:
Mythical Abode Mountain, Cloud’s End Cliff, the most dangerous of Azure Cloud Continent’s four deadly areas. Cloud’s End Cliff’s base is known as the Grim Reaper’s Cemetery.  
  
Over countless years, the number of people that have fallen off this cliff is too high to count. None of them, even three stronger than god masters, whose power could pierce the heavens, have been able to return alive. However, a boy that’s being chased by various people because he alone holds a priceless treasure jumps off the cliff, but instead of dying he wakes up in the body of a boy with the same name in another world!  
  
This is the story of a boy wielding the Sky Poison Pearl, cultivating the strength to oppose heaven and earth, a lord overlooking the world!

title.en: Shut Up, Malevolent Dragon! I Don’t Want to Have Any More Children With You

altTitles.zh: 闭嘴恶龙我不想再跟你带孩子了

altTitles.zh-ro: Bi Zui E Long Wo Buxiang Zai Gen Ni Dai Haizile

description.en:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
description.id: Setelah dikalahkan dan ditangkap, Dragon Slayer Leon menjadi tawanan Silver Dragon Queen. Dengan kesadaran akan kematian, dia menggunakan sihir terlarang untuk mengutuk sang ratu, tetapi secara tak terduga, sang ratu kehilangan kendali. Dia berpikir bahwa ini akan membuat sang ratu hidup dalam rasa malu seumur hidupnya, dan itu akan sepadan dengan misinya sebagai pemburu naga. Namun, dua tahun kemudian, ketika Leon membuka matanya, di sampingnya ada seorang gadis kecil naga dengan ekor...

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

title.en: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Hazure Skill “Gacha” de Tsuihou Sareta Ore wa, Wagamama Osananajimi wo Zetsuen Shi Kakusei Suru ~ Bannou Cheat Skill wo Getto Shite, Mezase Rakuraku Saikyou Slow Life!~

altTitles.ja: ハズレスキル『ガチャ』で追放された俺は、わがまま幼馴染を絶縁し覚醒する ～万能チートスキルをゲットして、目指せ楽々最強スローライフ！～

altTitles.en: After Being Banished For Having The Trash Skill "Gacha", I Came To My Senses And Broke Off Relations With My Selfish Childhood Friend

description.en: Crest was born as the fifth son of a duke. However, as the fifth son, he was in no position to talk. His childhood friend and also his fiancée, Ellis, treated him just like a slave. And on Crest's coming-of-age ceremony, he received a skill called "Gacha." Yet, he wasn't able to learn how to use it and was banished away from his home. Banished into the forest full of monsters, Crest began to understand the power "Gacha." And then, Crest made up his mind. He will definitely survive and get back on his feet.

altTitles.fr: Coma héroïque dans un autre monde

description.en: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.

Kyoko (21) and Jiro (23) live together in Tokyo without being married. 
She is a graphist in an advertisement agency, he's starting to be an illustrator. 
We follow them through their love struggles and daily life with friends and family 
in a world where sexual revolution is about to start.

title.en: Ningen no Taimashi o Katteiru Loli Baba

altTitles.ja: 人間の対魔師を飼っているロリババア

altTitles.ja-ro: Ningen no Taimashi wo Katteiru Loli Baba

altTitles.en: Loli Grannies Who Keep Human Exorcists as Pets

altTitles.es-la: Unas viejas lolis que tiene como mascotas a cazadores de demonios humanos

altTitles.ja: ぬっぺらぼう女子がさとしてくれる。

description.en:
She has style, she has grace, this girl has no face. 
Note: Nuppera-bō = Nuppeppō + Noppera-bō

"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
description.zh:
《人间有神兽，来自九重天 》

随着科技的发展，往日威风凛凛的神兽们日子大不如前。神兽四不像奉命下凡，去解救流落人间的落魄神兽。在凡间，他遇到了走投无路的老同事天禄，不得志的酒友兔爷，被贬下凡的金银角兄弟……从此开启了一段新的旅程。

description.en:
Haegu, a proficient and merciless hitwoman, executes a man in front of his own daughter and takes the child under her wing. She decides to name her Mian, the word for "sorry" in Korean, and gives her one mission: "Kill me when you can." From that moment on, Mian decides that she will do this by choking Haegu with feigned love and emotionally manipulating her into submission.

But as Mian grows into an adult, she's thrown into confusion as what was supposed to be pure revenge turns into lust... and possibly real love. Meanwhile, Haegu grapples with her own feelings for Mian while continuing to carry out life-threatening missions. Can Haegu and Mian ever learn to truly love each other, or are they doomed to drown in their toxic cycle of violence and revenge?
description.pt-br:
Haegu, uma assassina proficiente e impiedosa, executa um homem na frente de sua própria filha e toma a criança sob suas asas. Ela decide chamá-la de Mian, a palavra para "desculpe" em coreano, e dá a ela uma missão: "Mate-me quando puder". A partir desse momento, Mian decide que fará isso sufocando Haegu com amor fingido e manipulando-a emocionalmente até a submissão.

Mas à medida que Mian se torna adulta, ela fica confusa quando o que deveria ser pura vingança se transforma em luxúria ... e possivelmente amor real. Enquanto isso, Haegu luta com seus próprios sentimentos por Mian enquanto continua a realizar missões com risco de vida. Será que Haegu e Mian podem aprender a se amar de verdade, ou eles estão condenados a se afogar em seu ciclo tóxico de violência e vingança?

altTitles.ja: 推しの下僕になりまして

description.en: The protagonist, grieving the death of her favorite character, finds herself reincarnated into the game's world before her beloved's demise! As the mob character Lou Lurea, she resolves to save her favorite character no matter what. However, she is reincarnated into a magical academy filled with handsome vampires. As the only human, Lou is nothing more than a delicious treat to everyone. While being pursued as "prey" by the characters, she struggles to prevent her favorite's bad ending...?! A story begins where love for her favorite character changes destiny!

altTitles.ja: 憂国のモリアーティ-The Remains-

description.en: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.

The underground speaks of hitman of incredible skill, this man goes by the name "Jesus." Why, you ask? because that happens to be last word to escape the lips of any fool unfortunate enough to be caught on the wrong end of his gun.


----

Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **J**

Lin Yan, a cold and arrogant female forensic expert, meets Song Yuhan, a righteous and sharp female detective. From being incompatible to becoming friends, they witness the lives of many ordinary people along the way: a young girl who struggles to survive but dies innocently, an old mother who waits for her criminal son to return in the mountains, a timid policeman who faces a gun-wielding robber bravely... 

They fight for the rights of the living, speak for the dead, and vow to uncover the truth that has been silent for years.

From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
description.pt-br:
De colegas de classe a irmão e irmã, vivendo sob o mesmo teto.

Após o novo casamento de seu pai, Asamura Yuuta acaba ganhando uma nova meia-irmã, coincidentemente a beleza número um do ano escolar, Ayase Saki. Tendo aprendido valores importantes no que diz respeito aos relacionamentos homem-mulher através dos anteriores de seus pais, eles prometem um ao outro não ser muito próximos, não ser muito opostos e apenas manter uma distância vaga e confortável.

Por um lado, Saki, que trabalhou sozinha pelo bem de sua família, não sabe como confiar adequadamente nos outros, enquanto Yuta não tem certeza de como realmente tratá-la. Estando em terreno bastante igual, os dois aprendem lentamente a sensação confortável de viver juntos.

O relacionamento deles evolui lentamente de estranhos à medida que os dias passam. Eventualmente, isso pode acabar em uma história sobre o amor, pelo que sabemos.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.pt-br: Sem querer seduzi o caçula do reino

altTitles.ru: Я случайно соблазнила младшего брата главного героя

altTitles.ja: 間違って男主人公の弟を口説いちゃった

altTitles.id: Tidak sengaja menggoda adik male lead

altTitles.zh: 不小心勾引了男主的弟弟

altTitles.es: No quise cautivar al hermano menor del protagonista masculino

altTitles.vi: Tôi Đã Vô Tình Quyến Rũ Em Trai Của Nam Chính

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)
description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9842)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/146753)
* [Portuguese (Brazilian) / Português brasileiro](https://br.comikey.com/comics/sem-querer-seduzi-o-cacula-do-reino-webtoon/709/)

description.en:
My name is Miyabi Mifu. I'm a lonely sixth-grader, and I don't have any parents or relatives.....or so I thought for the last twelve years!

One day, I found out I'm a quadruplet!! Three other girls that have the same face and voice: Ichika-chan, Nitori-chan, and Shizuki-chan. We were all raised alone in different places, but from now on we're going to be living under the same roof. However, living with only other children is chaos! Also, the differences in our upbringing could lead to some uexpected circumstances...?

We're all the same, but we're also different! Our cute sisterhood life begins now!

title.en: To Those of You for Whom Even Regret Is a Luxury

altTitles.en: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury

description.en:
My younger sister became a great soprano through a song I wrote, had an affair with my husband, and my husband said it was all my fault. The moment I was dying at the hands of my family who deceived me, a second life miraculously obtained. I decided to get everything right from the beginning.

“A cheating wife. It's tempting. “You look like fun, you.”

I decided to borrow the power of this man, who was called a vicious murderer, and begin my revenge.

The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.

In Gyeongseong, the city of glittering lights and glamorous desire, Gyeongseong Detective Agency has opened its doors at No. 45, District 1, Myeongchijeong. Sohwa, a 16-year-old servant girl, has nothing to her name but her wits and bravery. When she accidentally gets caught up in a secret scheme, she meets Jeong Haegyeong, a young man running his own detective agency. Chased by memories from the past, they must work together to clear her name.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

title.en: The Color of the End: Mission in the Apocalypse

description.en:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans.
Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land.
Will humans be found?
A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
[Alt Official Raw (KADOComi)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)
description.fr: Dans une métropole post-apocalyptique déserte criblée d'une matière mystérieuse, une jeune fille recherche tout signe de vie et des provisions.
description.tr: İnsanlığın yok olduğu bir dünyada dolaşan yalnız bir kız hakkında kıyamet sonrası bilimkurgu macerası.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.th: ศึกเดือด 5 วิพลิกชะตา

description.en:
It was just a usual morning.  
  
Akira Shiroyanagi, a high schooler who loves games and Konpeito (Japanese sweets), is suddenly dragged into a battlefield by a mysterious girl who calls herself Mion. The participants are told that they are "erased from the family register, involved in an experiment, and have gained certain powers."  
  
Akira is determined to win the game with his newfound powers and destroy the organization. Armed with a power no one expects and his "brain" skills, a new era of intelligence battle of begins!

title.en: Boku no Suki na Hito ga Suki na Hito

altTitles.ja: ぼくの好きな人が好きな人

altTitles.zh-hk: 我喜歡的人所喜歡的人

description.en: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
description.ru: Эта история начинается с того, что главный герой, мальчик по имени Сора Акидзуки, признается в любви Мие Фува, девушке, в которую он давно влюблен, и получает отказ. Когда Сора узнает, что Мия любит другого, он посещает сомнительный “Эксперементальный клуб”, президентом которого является этот незнакомец, и пытается выяснить, подходит ли он ей. В первом эпизоде показана реальность Эксперементального клуба, деятельность которого невозможно представить, исходя из его названия, и причина, по которой его президент Судзукадзе создал этот клуб.
description.vi:
Câu chuyện này bắt đầu khi nhân vật chính, một chàng trai tên Sora Akizuki, thú nhận tình yêu của mình với Miya Fuwa, một cô gái mà anh đã yêu từ lâu nhưng bị từ chối. Khi Sora biết rằng Miya thích một người khác, anh ấy đã đến thăm “Câu lạc bộ thử việc” đáng ngờ mà anh ấy là chủ tịch, và cố gắng tìm hiểu xem anh ấy có phải là người phù hợp với cô ấy không.
Tập đầu tiên cho thấy thực tế của Câu lạc bộ Thử nghiệm, những hoạt động mà người ta không thể tưởng tượng được từ cái tên của nó, và lý do tại sao chủ tịch của nó, Suzukaze, lại thành lập câu lạc bộ.
description.es-la: Está historia empieza cuando el protagonista, un chico llamado Sora Akizuki, confiesa su amor a Miya Fuwa, una chica de la que está enamorado desde hace tiempo, y es rechazado. Cuando Sora se entera de que a Miya le gusta otra persona, visita el dudoso "Club de Ensayos", del que es presidente, e intenta averiguar si es la persona adecuada para ella. El primer episodio muestra la realidad del Club de Ensayos, cuyas actividades no se puede imaginar por su nombre, y la razón por la que su presidente, Suzukaze, creó el club.

description.ar: بعد انتهاء القتال مع وايلي روكمان يخوض معركة جديدة كطبيب اسنان في العالم الحقيقي
description.en: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!
description.ja: Dr.ワイリーとの戦いから月日が経ち、ロックマンは平和な世の中で大人になった。ライト博士が開業した歯科医院で歯科医として働くロックマンは、かつて戦いを繰り広げた“仲間”とともに日々の生活で奮闘する!!

altTitles.fr: Le dragon domestique de Mme. Kobayashi

altTitles.es: La sirvienta dragón de la señorita Kobayashi

altTitles.th: น้องเมดมังกรของคุณโคบายาชิ

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada Dragão da Senhorita Kobayashi

altTitles.pt: A Empregada Dragão da Senhora Kobayashi

description.en:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E6%9E%97%E3%81%95%E3%82%93%E3%81%A1%E3%81%AE%E3%83%A1%E3%82%A4%E3%83%89%E3%83%A9%E3%82%B4%E3%83%B3)
description.ru:
Жила себе и жила Кобаяши-сан. Одна в своей квартире, пока на пороге её дома не появилась Тору, у которой долг перед Кобаяши-сан за своё спасение. И Тору всячески желает вернуть его различными способами каждый день. Милая и повседневная комедия. Только есть одна необычная деталь: Тору – влюбленная драконесса.  
  
Licensed in English by Seven Seas as "Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid."  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18807)
description.es-la: Kobayashi vive en un apartamento cuando un dia un dragon llamado Tooru toca a su puerta. Tooru piensa que los humanos son humildes y tontos pero ella tiene una deuda con Kobayashi que la salvo en el pasado. Por eso todos los dias Tooru trata de usar sus poderes para ayudar a Kobayashi en varias cosas. Una comedia de una señora de oficina y una linda chica maid dragon viviendo juntas el día a día
description.pt-br: Kobayashi vive sozinha em um apartamento, até que um dia, Tooru, a garota dragão, apareceu e elas acabaram morando juntas. Tooru vê os humanos como seres inferiores e tolos. Mas tendo sido salva por Kobayashi-san, ela faz tudo que pode para pagar a dívida e ajudá-la com várias coisas, embora nem tudo corre conforme o planejado. Uma comédia do cotidiano mítico sobre uma mulher do escritório trabalhando duro para viver com uma garota dragão.

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

altTitles.en: The S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

description.en:
"I'm done with romance, so send me home!"

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.

Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home! Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

"Can I go home...?"
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

description.en:
"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.

On the moon, there is an advance civilization of bunny people who used to be identical to humans, but after incorporating themselves with bunny genes, transformed into docile creatures. The result is a society where AI are entrusted with all choices, from the content of meals to how each minute of leisure time should be spent. Amongst this society is a bunny girl named Uko who dislikes this lifestyle, complaining "Let me choose for myself!!". One day, Uko decides to flee the moon and head to Earth where she meets Hane, a bunny girl investigating life on Earth. On this planet with many strange customs, these two will...!?

altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door
I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!

Blue Archive GLB's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

For the Official English and Korean versions, you can find them on the respective server's Twitter account.

The series is titled (Global) to differentiate it from the Japanese 4-Koma.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女ホロウィッチ！

description.en: Manga adaptation of the mixed media project "holoWitches", featuring members of VTuber group Hololive as magical girls.
description.ja:
配信アプリ『ホロキャス』を通じて、人々の心の光『ホロ』が集まったことで生まれた
魔法の世界『ホロキャス界』が存在する世界。

主人公たちは普段は『ホロキャス』の配信者として活動している。
日々の生活で不安やストレスを抱え、前向きな心を失ってしまった人間が、
その魂を『ホロキャス界』に吸い込まれてしまう『ユメオチ』現象。
そして『ユメオチ』によって生み出される怪物『コラプサー』。

『コラプサー』を倒し、『ユメオチ』してしまった人々を助けるため、
主人公たちは魔法少女『ホロウィッチ』に変身し、戦う日々を送る。
『ユメオチ』とは何なのか。暗躍するモノたちと戦い、
人々に夢と希望を届ける魔法少女たちの物語がはじまる。

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

Beautiful creatures called 'Alichino' grant any wish to those who find them–but at a price!  
  
A young lady searching for an Alichino wants to bring her brother back to life. She meets Tsugiri, a handsome young man who she thinks is an Alichino. While Tsugiri turns out to be a mere mortal, he does have a mysterious connection with these rare creatures–a connection that brings him and those around him grave danger!

Eight hundred years ago, the pure-blooded and noble Crown Prince, Xie Lian, was a well-regarded child of heaven with unlimited boundaries. However, who knew that after ascending, achieving immortality and becoming a Martial God that thousands of people worshipped, that his life would only go downhill. He was demoted and fell down the ranks until he reached rock bottom.  
  
Eight hundred years later, Xie Lian has ascended once again, but this time he has neither the followers nor any incense burned in his name. One day, on his way back from collecting trash, he picks up a mysterious youth and takes him home. This particular youth however, actually turns out to be Hua Cheng, the infamous Ghost King known throughout the three realms who could change both his gender and appearance at the flip of a dime.  
  
NOTE: Heaven Official's Blessing has been re-released on bilibili from the prologue with some special extras due to the original release not being very coherent unless you've read its source material (novel). This is the new version.
description.id:
Delapan ratus tahun yang lalu, Putra Mahkota berdarah murni dan mulia, Xie Lian, adalah anak surga yang dihormati dengan batas yang tidak terbatas. Namun, siapa yang tahu bahwa setelah naik, mencapai keabadian dan menjadi Dewa Perang yang disembah ribuan orang, bahwa hidupnya hanya akan menurun. Dia diturunkan dan peringkatnya menurun sampai mencapai titik terendah.  
  
Delapan ratus tahun kemudian, Xie Lian telah naik sekali lagi, tetapi kali ini ia tidak memiliki pengikut atau dupa yang terbakar dalam namanya. Suatu hari, dalam perjalanan kembali dari mengumpulkan sampah, ia bertemu seorang pemuda misterius dan membawanya pulang. Namun pemuda khusus ini, ternyata adalah Hua Cheng, Raja Iblis yang terkenal di tiga alam yang dapat mengubah jenis kelamin dan penampilannya dengan cepat.
description.pl:
Osiemset lat temu czystokrwisty i szlachetny Książę Koronny, Xie Lian, był wysoce poważanym dzieckiem Niebios z nieograniczonymi możliwościami. Jednak kto by się spodziewał, że po wzniesieniu się do Niebios, osiągnięciu nieśmiertelności i zostaniu Bogiem Wojny, którego czciły tysiące, jego życie całkiem się rozpadnie. Został wygnany, aż osiągnął dno.
Osiemset lat później Xie Lian znowu wzniósł się do Niebios, ale tym razem nie miał ani popleczników, ani nikt nie palił w jego imieniu kadzidła. Pewnego dnia, wracając z kolejnego dnia spędzonego na zbieraniu złomu, spotkał tajemniczego młodzieńca i zabrał go do domu. Ten okazał się być Hua Chengiem, Królem Demonów cieszącym się złą opinią we wszystkich trzech wymiarach.

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

description.en: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.

The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
